sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' const IndChar = ({ character }) => { const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let favCharacter = { name: character.name, image: character.img } let config = { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-type": "application/json", "Accepts": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(favCharacter) } fetch("http://localhost:3000/favCharacters", config) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)) } return (

{character.name}

Nickname: {character.nickname}
Portrayed By: {character.portrayed}
Status: {character.status}
Occupation(s): {character.occupation.join(', ')}
) } export default IndChar
